document.full_text: diet coke has topped rival pepsi-cola for the first time to become the second-most popular soft drink in the country behind coca-cola.
document.title: diet coke surpasses pepsi to become no. 2 soda in u.s.
lines_and_colors: diet coke has topped rival pepsi-cola for the first time to become the second-most popular soft drink in the country behind coca-cola.
